p: The obtained crude LP extract by the MAE and LP-rich fraction after purification using Amberlite XAD16N resin were characterised by UPLC-DAD-MS, and major polyphenolic constituents were identified and quantified. Three main compounds were identified, including hesperidin, eriocitrin and diosmin ( Figure 4). Other minor components such as ferulic acid, rutin, hydroxybenzoic acid, eriodyctiol and coumaric acid were also found.
